lexUnit.name: critical.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: expressing adverse or disapproving comments or judgements.

sentence.text: Because of the censorship , and the obvious need to avoid dangerously critical comments about the regime and the war , the correspondence to and from the front provides no easy guide to political attitudes .
